definition: to worry helplessly
dry/clean/in vain/dried food/foster/adoptive/to ignore
variant of 乾|干[gan1]
old variant of 乾|干[gan1]
to concern/to interfere/shield/stem
surname Gan
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
(chess) move/trick/all right!/(dialect) to add
to wear (clothes)/to contact/to use/to apply
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
urgent/pressing/rapid/hurried/worried/to make (sb) anxious

sentences.english: The people around looked at him in anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 周围的人看着他，干着急。

sentences.english: She also helped the monitor in hosting the school sports game.
sentences.chinese: 帮着班长举办了全校运动会，看得济南干着急。

sentences.english: Hearing his clumsy-tongued manner, she can do nothing but stand anxiously by his side.
sentences.chinese: 看着他拙嘴笨舌的样子，她在旁边都干着急。

sentences.english: A few tantalizing sips was all I had ever had, and certainly never my own bottle.
sentences.chinese: 我有的只是偶尔一次干着急的吸一口，从没有过一罐。

sentences.english: Give the dog the bone—don't tantalize him.
sentences.chinese: 把骨头给那条狗吧别让它干着急了。

sentences.english: So do not worry, but also how not.
sentences.chinese: 叫人干着急，却也奈何不了。

definition: to watch helplessly
no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
waiting anxiously/impatient
worried/anxious
lit. to have one's hands bound and be unable to do anything about it (idiom); fig. helpless in the face of a crisis
to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
to tweak one's ears and scratch one's cheeks (as an expression of anxiety, delight, frustration etc) (idiom)
to be unable to find a solution/to be at wits' end
lit. to gaze at the ocean and lament one's inadequacy (idiom)/fig. to feel powerless and incompetent (to perform a task)
unable to help however much one would like to (idiom); Although we sympathize, there is no way to help you./My hands are tied.
water in a distant place is of little use in putting out a fire right here/(fig.) a slow remedy does not address the current emergency
pinyin: yuan3 shui3 jiu4 bu5 liao3 jin4 huo3

definition: sighing voice, wailing breath (idiom)/to heave deep sighs/to sigh in despair
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it

at one's wit's end/unable to find a way out
